duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a business liaison between Finance Departments and internal/external resources to define business needs and system requirements.
Collaborate within the Finance department to design solutions that impact Financial Statements and Reporting.
Assist in implementing enhanced technology use and streamlining existing processes to drive departmental efficiencies.
Act as a key resource for processes from Operational Systems through to GL Postings and assist with testing and verifying systems.
Research and vet projects that impact Finance Departments and provide updates to stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Degree in business, finance, accounting, or any finance-related degree (Master's preferred)
